customer_reviews.title: Great wine glasses (especially if you break them a lot like me)...  and great price.  Can 't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of glasses. I drink a lot of wine and I break a lot of wine glasses. As an expert wine glass breaker I consider myself sort of a verifiable expert on the subject. I have knocked over these glasses twice and dropped one in the sink... cringing while expecting to see it break. But it didn't. I once owned a set of 60 dollar a piece of Zalto De'Art wine glasses. Broke every one and I said no more! So I bought a set of Riedel wine glasses for around 140 dollars. I broke everyone. I bought this set and I think they are as nice as the Riedel's and possibly stronger... Very impressed. Great Buy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: My favorite glass! Feels great on your lips

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bourbon, whiskey, negronis, and juice

I reordered and they arrived yesterday in perfect condition. We are so pleased- these are perfect for us.
